description:
net/http: fix doc inaccuracy and typo; tighten test

Note url.Error wrapping, and s/issue/issuing/.

Fixes issue 3724

messages.text:
On Tue, Jun 19, 2012 at 4:22 PM,  <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:

> net/url: fix doc inaccuracy and typo

This is in net/http, not net/url.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=60041e23de38 ***

net/http: fix doc inaccuracy and typo; tighten test

Note url.Error wrapping, and s/issue/issuing/.

Fixes issue 3724

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
